org.dotplot.ui
Class ConfigurationView

java.lang.Object
  java.util.Observable
      org.dotplot.ui.ConfigurationView
Direct Known Subclasses:
ConfigGridView, ConfigQImageView, FMatrixConfigurationView, SelectFilterView, SelectTokenizerView
public abstract class ConfigurationView
extends java.util.Observable

The View of the MVC - design pattern.

Model - IGUIDotplotter Controller - ViewController

The Controller is observing the View. When something changes the Controller manipulates the Model in the way the View dictates. Then the View uses the changed Model to show the user the changes he caused.

The Controller observes a View by calling the addObserver(Observer) method.

Author:
Christian Gerhardt
See Also:
ConfigurationViews, org.dotplot.IGUIDotplotter, ViewController

name

private java.lang.String name
The tab-name of the ConfigurationView

changeListener

protected org.eclipse.swt.events.SelectionListener changeListener
The changelistener. This listener listens for changings in the view. To avoid calling observers when nothing is changed the Observable class is calling its Observers only if the Observable is marked that it has been changed by calling the setChanged method. This listener calls that method an developers could associate this listener with their Composites.

See Also:
Observer, Observable
